title: Detection of a reassortant swine H1N2 influenza A virus from pigs in Hong Kong.
abstract: • Full-length genome sequences of reassortant swine influenza A(H1N2) virus from domestic pigs in Hong Kong SAR. • These swine influenza A(H1N2) viruses are closely related with those circulating in Taiwan. • Swine influenza A(H1N2) viruses possess potential risk of pig-to-human transmission.
